sentences.en: ...the illegal diversion of profits from secret arms sales.
sentences.cn: …销售秘密武器所得收益的非法转移。

sentences.en: a river diversion project
sentences.cn: 河流改道工程

sentences.en: A slight diversion in the road is causing major headaches for businesses along El Camino Real.
sentences.cn: 马路上的一小段绕行道让国王大道沿街的商家十分头疼。

sentences.en: By and by I made another diversion, and beguiled her to sketch her story.
sentences.cn: 不一会,我又想法子往旁处岔, 花言巧语地把她那么一哄,她就居然把她的故事粗枝大叶地说了一遍.

sentences.en: Finger painting is very messy but an excellent diversion.
sentences.cn: 用手指画画是很脏，但却是一项极好的消遣。

sentences.en: High tariffs often cause a diversion of trade from one country to another.
sentences.cn: 高额关税常使贸易从一国转往另一国.

sentences.en: High tariffs often cause diversion of trade from one country to another.
sentences.cn: 高额关税常使贸易由一国转向另一国.

sentences.en: His last argument was a diversion to make us forget the main point.
sentences.cn: 他最后的论点是在声东击西,想让我们忘掉要点.

sentences.en: In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its "depraved diversion."
sentences.cn: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

sentences.en: In the evening I used to prowl about, hunting for diversion.
sentences.cn: 晚上我总是偷偷地溜出去, 想寻找一点消遣.

sentences.en: Movies can be a worthwhile diversion.
sentences.cn: 电影可以成为一种有益的娱乐.

sentences.en: the diversion of the river
sentences.cn: 河流改道

sentences.en: The enemy diversion you are not ignoring is the main attack.
sentences.cn: 那支你不加主意的敌军部队其实是攻击的主力.

sentences.en: The enemy diversion you're ignoring is their main attack.
sentences.cn: 那支你以为是徉动的敌兵其实是主攻部队.

sentences.en: The merry film clacked on, and I was glad of the diversion.
sentences.cn: 有趣的影片继续放映下去, 我也乐得散一散心.

sentences.en: The party will make a pleasant diversion.
sentences.cn: 晚会会是个很不错的消遣。

sentences.en: The robbers threw smoke bombs to create a diversion.
sentences.cn: 劫匪扔烟幕弹来转移人们的视线。

sentences.en: The world's gains are tied to trade creation and its losses to trade diversion.
sentences.cn: 世界利益与贸易开辟相联系,而其损失则与贸易转移相联系.

sentences.en: Two prisoners created a diversion to give the men time to escape.
sentences.cn: 两名囚犯想办法分散了大家的注意力，使那些人有时间逃跑。

sentences.en: Usually there is lively chatter before the evening's diversion.
sentences.cn: 通常在晚上娱乐之前,总有一阵很活跃的叽叽喳喳的谈话.

words.tran_cn: 转换注意力的；牵制性的
消遣地；有趣地；消愁解闷地
阴谋破坏者；敌后工作者；背离党规者；进行牵制活动者
使转移；使得到消遣（divert的现在分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 贸易转移，贸易转向；贸易多样化

trans.tran_cn: 转向，偏离，令人分心的事情，消遣，临时绕行路
trans.tran_en: a change in the direction or use of something, or the act of changing it
